msbt.message: Hey! I'm so glad I jogged into you. I got something that's gonna take your festive spirit to the next level.Ho ho hiya! It's a festive wreath! Pretty awesome, huh?
Your festive spirit is gonna look totally RIPPED once you put this up. Just you wait!It's also good for letting the guy in red know where to leave presents. Just saying, !
But you know what's not awesome? Your pockets are full, !Well, I don't mind carrying this. Extra weight equals extra fitness! But find me once you have pocket space, OK?
